direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods add key-value pairs to the map but with different insertion logic.
Both methods modify the map's state by either adding or removing entries.
Both methods involve adding multiple entries to the map, though putAll does so in bulk.
Both methods handle the addition of multiple entries with specific insertion logic.
Both methods modify the values associated with keys, though setValue does so at a specific index.

Environment setup is required before performing map operations.
